1142700.name: The Gateway Trilogy Demo
1142700.description:
Gateway is an award-winning minimalist adventure game series set in a mostly empty black void. The Gateway Trilogy includes remastered versions of the first two games – plus a never-before-seen third installment.

The Gateway Series

The Gateway games have a deceptively simple premise: guide a character through a series of rooms, solve puzzles in order to progress.

Gateway I & II were originally released as freeware back in 2006 and 2007. For the trilogy edition they have been completely remastered with enhancements to sound, gameplay and visuals – along with the addition of a never-before-seen third installment.
